page.title: 12 A Wootton Family Day.
page.content: 07.00 Elder son goes to his paper round and father goes to work. 08.00 Elder son returns.Mother,daughter and younger son get up and dress. 09.00 Children at school. 11.00 Mother goes out to work cleaning. 15.30 Mother collects youngest son from school.Elder son returns. 16.00 Daughter comes home from school. 16.30 Father comes home. 17.00 All have tea,wash up and dry. Daughter goes out to play. 19.00 Daughter with friend visits a neighbour and then goes to recreation ground. 20.00 Daughter at home reads book and has supper. Parents talking. 21.00 Children get ready for bed and say goodnight. 22.00 Parents have early night. 23.00 All fast asleep.Phone rings, waking everybody.
